enum  Enum { eVF_ATTACHED = (1<<0) }

Detailed Description

Flags which describe how cooking should treat a cloth mesh vertex.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum PxClothMeshVertFlag::Enum

Enumerator:
eVF_ATTACHED  The vertex is attached, so the cooker should take the constraint into account.
